nodes.text: Falco, ostensibly "Captain" Falco, was a male human high-ranking officer in the Human League serving Thrackan Sal-Solo during the First Corellian Insurrection.
He served on Thrackan's self-styled "Honor Detail." On Thrackan's orders, he released a Selonian prisoner named Dracmus to fight Han Solo for the League officers' amusement.
